name: dat_fire_jerk
description: Dat Fire Jerk is one of those downhome places that don’t look like much on the outside, but on the grill, it’s legit.

name: caribbean_delights
description: Caribbean Delights is a small counter-serve restaurant that packs a powerful punch when it comes to its culinary might. The restaurant serves Caribbean eats & vegetarian options.
address: 576 Lee St SW B, Atlanta, GA 30310

name: conch_heaven
description: Conch Heaven, in the Peachtree Pavilion Shopping Center, has some of the most loyal customers in the area when it comes to Caribbean food.

name: scotch_bonnett_jamaican_restaurant
description: Scotch Bonnett is well known for its fire jerk chicken on the south side of Atlanta. The restaurant gives you a nice portion, too.
